publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3410 Margaret Jamieson: Guardian Public Services Awards Finalists 2005—That the Parliament congratulates Robin Gourlay, Head of Onsite Services at East Ayrshire Council, and his school meals staff in being the only Scottish finalists in this year’s Guardian Public Services Awards in two categories: Service Delivery – Children’s Services and Innovation and Progress - Customer Service and recognises the dedication of the school meals staff in contributing to the successful revolution in school meals in East Ayrshire with the roll-out of the organic and local produce pilot.
S2M-3410 Guardian Public Services Awards Finalists 2005 (lodged on 11 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3410 Guardian Public Services Awards Finalists 2005 (lodged on 11 October 2005) Scott Barrie*
